snippet.title: Sagebrush - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/864100/Sagebrush/
Itch.io: https://redactgames.itch.io/sagebrush

Sagebrush is a first-person narrative adventure game about exploring a cult compound in the remote New Mexico desert. Discover the lives of the former inhabitants -- what brought them together, what they believed, and why they ended it all.

COMING FALL 2018.

Sagebrush is the debut release from Redact Games, the studio from Nate Berens, also known for his Youtube gaming history channel Ludodrome.
